00020 #include "SubGraphChecker.h"
00021 
00022 namespace brics_3d {
00023 
00024 namespace rsg {
00025 
00026 SubGraphChecker::SubGraphChecker(unsigned int subGraphNodeId) : INodeVisitor(upwards) {
00027         reset(subGraphNodeId);
00028 }
00029 
00030 SubGraphChecker::~SubGraphChecker() {
00031 
00032 }
00033 
00034 void SubGraphChecker::visit(Node* node) {
00035         assert (node != 0);
00036         //LOG(DEBUG) << "Visiting node with ID: " << node->getId();
00037 
00038         /* check if IDs match */
00039         if (node->getId() == subGraphNodeId) {
00040                 isInSubGraph = true;
00041                 pathCount++;
00042         }
00043 }
00044 
00045 void SubGraphChecker::visit(Group* node){
00046         this->visit(dynamic_cast<Node*>(node)); //just feed forward to be handled as node
00047 }
00048 
00049 void SubGraphChecker::visit(Transform* node){
00050         this->visit(dynamic_cast<Node*>(node)); //just feed forward to be handled as node
00051 }
00052 
00053 void SubGraphChecker::visit(GeometricNode* node){
00054         this->visit(dynamic_cast<Node*>(node)); //just feed forward to be handled as node
00055 }
00056 
00057 void SubGraphChecker::reset(unsigned int subGraphNodeId) {
00058         this->subGraphNodeId = subGraphNodeId;
00059         isInSubGraph = false;
00060         pathCount = 0;
00061 }
00062 
00063 }
00064 
00065 }
